candidate.name: Aniruddh Dadhich
candidate.cover_letter:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the Full Stack Developer position at your organization. With over two years of experience building scalable, production-grade applications, I bring strong expertise across frontend, backend, and modern cloud-based systems.

In my current role, I have worked on enterprise platforms involving React, Angular, Python, Java, FastAPI, and Spring Boot. My responsibilities include developing user-friendly interfaces, designing secure APIs, implementing automated testing, and supporting applications across development, staging, and production environments. I have also contributed to distributed systems, search platforms, and AI-driven solutions, enabling high-performance and reliable products.

I have a strong foundation in data structures, system design, and software engineering best practices. I am proactive in learning new technologies and enjoy translating business requirements into robust technical solutions. I value clean code, collaboration, and continuous improvement.

I am excited about the opportunity to contribute to your team and help build impactful, high-quality products. I would welcome the chance to discuss how my skills and experience can support your organizationâ€™s goals.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,
Aniruddh Dadhich
